Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Kinzie.
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Ferdinand, Hamlin, Washington, and Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/Kinzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Ferdinand, Hamlin, Washington, and Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/Kinzie.

Allow extra travel time.
